Shiny Application makes the conversions painless when cooking European Recipes in Europe

Here are the calcualtions:
$$
LiquidCups = \frac{Millitres}{236.588}
$$
 
$$
Cups = \frac{Grams}{236.588}
$$

$$
Ounces = \frac{Grams}{28.35}
$$

**Slider exist to give reactive results**

1. Enter information in grams and milletres

2. Results can be selected: Ounces, Cups and Cups LQ

3. Can ADD entries and download

The data table adds additional flexibilty
